memories: User prefers bullet points over long paragraphs when sharing information in professional emails
User enjoys casual, friendly tone when writing direct messages with coworkers
User prefers to avoid overuse of em-dashes and opt for commas instead
For casual thank you notes, the user prefers to add a ton of emojis!
Social media posts should be 120 characters or less to comply with Twitter's character limit
Social media posts should avoid overuse of emojis. One or two maximum.
Feature announcements should use 'we' language instead of 'I' language.
